mng: to spread out, to develop, to overflow, to amplify, superfluous

exm.mng: to multiply, to reproduce, to increase gradually in number or quantity
to give rise to, to derive, derivative, derivation
to elaborate (on a theme), to expound (the classics), perfunctory, to skimp, to botch, to do sth half-heartedly or just for show, barely enough to get by
a derivative (complex product derived from simpler source material)
to skimp, to work half-heartedly, not to bother

exm.pyn: jīn róng yǎn shēng chǎn pǐn

exm.mng: to evolve (of ideas, designs, constructions etc), to develop and change
